description:
Updates:

Get that ideal SAP Consultant job. Grab that promotion. Stand out by learning in-demand SAP tech skills from the best.

Course fully updated for 2015!

FULL PROJECT. REAL BUSINESS. CONCISE STRUCTURE.

This course now includes real life sample, further reading, and appendix to SAP niches - enabling you to boost SAP career.

Reviews:

"This is one of the best courses I have come across. The concepts are explained with realistic examples, all of which start with the basic covering."

"At the time I didn't know what to expect because I was a complete SAP rookie, I just wanted to learn something new and SAP Project sounded like something I would end up liking and applying later. And now I realize this course has helped me understand both SAP implementation processes and project methodology, nicely structured, nicely told."

SAP is a multinational software corporation that makes enterprise software to manage business operations. More than 80% of fortune 500 companies have successfully implemented SAP products. SAP was named the most valuable brand in Europe with a value of over 33 billion euros in 2015.

Implementing SAP is a ton of work, we will help you learn potential innovations at every step along the way. We will teach you how to implement SAP in a systematic way.

According to pay scale study, an SAP application consultant earns an average salary of $120000 per year!

Welcome to the #1 SAP project training on the Udemy.

SAP Project 101 is the introduction to SAP project for zero-prior-experience audience. Our online training is built in partnership with SAPBRIEF and ERPer Academy, and instructed by senior ERP consultants.

SAP Project 101 topics are covered with a mixture of video lectures and workbooks:

Introduction and Course Outline

  • Getting Started with SAP, ERP, SAP ERP Implementation and More!
  • Master Your Project Management Skills - Project Management Essentials
  • Phase 1 - Project Preparation
  • Phase 2 - Business Blueprint
  • Phase 3 â€“ Realization
  • Phase 4 - Final Preparation
  • Phase 5 - Golive Support

You'll stretch your SAP implementation expertise, SAP business functional knowledge, SAP technical skills and entrepreneur thinking.

Every minute you delay is actually COSTING you money.

Enroll today, we'll help you succeed and land your dream job.
title: SAP Project - A Step-by-step SAP Implementation Guide
